snippet: At least 31 people were killed Wednesday when gunmen attacked an army base in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, the military said, underlining the challenge facing a new United Nations intervention force in the territory.
abstract: Gunmen attack army base in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, killing at least 31 people, underlining challenge facing new United Nations intervention force in territory.
lead_paragraph: At least 31 people were killed Wednesday when gunmen attacked an army base in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, the military said, underlining the challenge facing a new United Nations intervention force in the territory.
